Uses of Interface
edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151.GhostMovementAlgorithm

    • Uses of GhostMovementAlgorithm in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151

      Classes in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151 that implement GhostMovementAlgorithm 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LinearGhostMovementAlgorithm
      The LinearGhostMovementAlgorithm scans linearly outward in all 8 directions from the Ghost and determines the nearest unexplored space in those directions.
      class  NearestGhostMovementAlgorithm
      The NearestGhostMovementAlgorithm chooses the nearest unexplored space to the Ghost and moves toward it.
      class  RandomGhostMovementAlgorithm
      The RandomGhostMovementAlgorithm chooses a random unexplored space and moves towards it.
      Methods in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151 that return GhostMovementAlgorithm 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GhostMovementAlgorithm GhostMovementAlgorithmType.CreateInstance() 
      GhostMovementAlgorithm Ghost.getMovementAlgorithm()
      Gets the movement algorithm this ghost is using
      Methods in edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151 with parameters of type GhostMovementAlgorithm 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Ghost.setMovementAlgorithm(GhostMovementAlgorithm movementAlgorithm)
      Sets the movement algorithm for this ghost to use
